distance.description: Determines the maximum distance the ray-cast will travel.
distance.markdownDescription: Determines the maximum distance the ray-cast will travel.

block.description: Determines whether the ray-cast should include blocks.
block.markdownDescription: Determines whether the ray-cast should include blocks.

entity.description: Determines whether the ray-cast should include entities.
entity.markdownDescription: Determines whether the ray-cast should include entities.

shape_type.description: Determines how the ray-cast will handle blocks.
shape_type.markdownDescription: Determines how the ray-cast will handle blocks.

fluid_handling.description: Determines how the ray-cast will handle fluids.
fluid_handling.markdownDescription: Determines how the ray-cast will handle fluids.

space.description: The space to execute the raycast in. Defaults to `"local"` unless `direction` has been specified, in which case it will default to `"world"`.
space.markdownDescription: The space to execute the raycast in. Defaults to `"local"` unless `direction` has been specified, in which case it will default to `"world"`.

direction.description: Used to specify the direction of the raycast. Can have a `x`, `y` and `z` [Floats](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/entity_action_types/raycast).
direction.markdownDescription: Used to specify the direction of the raycast. Can have a `x`, `y` and `z` [Floats](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/entity_action_types/raycast).

bientity_condition.description: If specified, the specified bi-entity action type will only be executed if the specified bi-entity condition type is fulfilled by either or both the 'actor' (the entity that has the power) or 'target' (the entity that was hit by the ray-cast).
bientity_condition.markdownDescription: If specified, the specified bi-entity action type will only be executed if the specified bi-entity condition type is fulfilled by either or both the 'actor' (the entity that has the power) or 'target' (the entity that was hit by the ray-cast).

bientity_action.description: If specified, this bi-entity action type will be executed on either or both the 'actor' (the entity that has the power) or 'target' (the entity that was hit by the ray-cast).
bientity_action.markdownDescription: If specified, this bi-entity action type will be executed on either or both the 'actor' (the entity that has the power) or 'target' (the entity that was hit by the ray-cast).

entity_distance.description: Determines the distance of the raycast for entities if `entity` is set to `true`. If absent, it will use the higher value between the entity's attack range (with Reach Entity Attributes compatibility) or the `distance` field.
entity_distance.markdownDescription: Determines the distance of the raycast for entities if `entity` is set to `true`. If absent, it will use the higher value between the entity's attack range (with Reach Entity Attributes compatibility) or the `distance` field.

block_action.description: If specified, this block action type will be executed on the block the ray-cast has hit.
block_action.markdownDescription: If specified, this block action type will be executed on the block the ray-cast has hit.

block_distance.description: Determines the distance of the raycast for blocks if `block` is set to `true`. If absent, it will use the higher value between the entity's block reach (with Reach Entity Attributes compatibility) or the `distance` field.
block_distance.markdownDescription: Determines the distance of the raycast for blocks if `block` is set to `true`. If absent, it will use the higher value between the entity's block reach (with Reach Entity Attributes compatibility) or the `distance` field.

before_action.description: If specified, execute this entity action type *before* casting a ray.
before_action.markdownDescription: If specified, execute this entity action type *before* casting a ray.

hit_action.description: If specified, execute this entity action on the entity that executed the ray-cast if the ray-cast has hit an entity/block.
hit_action.markdownDescription: If specified, execute this entity action on the entity that executed the ray-cast if the ray-cast has hit an entity/block.

miss_action.description: If specified, execute this entity action on the entity that executed the ray-cast if the ray-cast did not hit an entity/block.
miss_action.markdownDescription: If specified, execute this entity action on the entity that executed the ray-cast if the ray-cast did not hit an entity/block.

command_at_hit.description: The command to execute upon the block/entity the ray-cast has hit.
command_at_hit.markdownDescription: The command to execute upon the block/entity the ray-cast has hit.

command_hit_offset.description: Determines the offset of the command specified in the `command_at_hit` field.
command_hit_offset.markdownDescription: Determines the offset of the command specified in the `command_at_hit` field.

command_along_ray.description: The command to execute for each step of the ray-cast.
command_along_ray.markdownDescription: The command to execute for each step of the ray-cast.

command_step.description: Determines the size of the step of the ray-cast (in blocks).
command_step.markdownDescription: Determines the size of the step of the ray-cast (in blocks).

command_along_ray_only_on_hit.description: Determines if the command specified in the `command_along_ray` field should be executed only if the ray-cast has hit a block/entity.
command_along_ray_only_on_hit.markdownDescription: Determines if the command specified in the `command_along_ray` field should be executed only if the ray-cast has hit a block/entity.
